content: Thanks, Greg! As all things, you just have start with the first steps: Please check first if a group already exists: https://github.com/freeCodeCamp/freeCodeCamp/wiki/LocalGroups-List If not, create one, usually on Facebook. Please invite first, if they are willing, some of your acquaintances, if not, ask them if they know people that might be interested in this. Once you get a couple of people interested in this, based on what people want and their skill level, you can start planning your next move. Good luck and let us know if we can further help you!
